name: 125 GB of LAM
description:
*Disclaimer, this is a Prototype and still in development*

You are a virus trying to upload yourself onto the internet. In order to achieve this, you'll need to solve puzzles to bypass each computer's security system; you can gain time by interacting with the electronic devices that are in your current level. There are 5 levels to beat, with increasing difficulty.

If you have played the game, please consider giving us feedback with this form (5-10min): https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=xQ4KNpTw8UWjGcbcNWAnBFLct4xp...

Credits:

Programming: Christophe , Alex , Dany

Art; Anouk , Thierry
